Control Description: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried.
Evidence Required: Asset inventory export; CMDB reconciliation report

Control Description: Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried.
Evidence Required: Software inventory scan results; license reconciliation

Control Description: Organizational cybersecurity policy is established and communicated.
Evidence Required: Approved policy document; annual acknowledgment records

Control Description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented.
Evidence Required: Monthly vulnerability scan reports; remediation tickets

Control Description: Risk management processes are established, managed, and agreed to by stakeholders.
Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked, and audited.

Evidence Required: Encryption configuration evidence; key management logs

Control Description: Configuration change control processes are in place.
Evidence Required: Change tickets; CAB approvals; change logs

Control Description: All users are informed and trained.
Detected events are analyzed to understand attack targets and methods.
Evidence Required: SIEM alert triage records; incident analysis notes

Control Description: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events.
Response plan is executed during or after an incident.
Incidents are reported consistent with established criteria.
Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident.
